Instance.description: Situation for the vampire nighttime visit.

TunableList.name: active_powers
TunableList.description: A list of Perks and buff to add if the perk is unlocked whenever the vampire decides to enter the household.

TunableTuple.description: Tuple of perk and buff powers.

TunableTuple.name: buff_to_add
TunableTuple.description: Temporary buff to add for the specified power to the Sim while doing the break in.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

TunableList.name: can_start_walkby_limiting_tags
TunableList.description:
Don't start a situation of this type if another situation is already running that has any of these tags in its tags field.
For instance, if you only want one Streaker at a time you would create a new tag SITUATION_STREAKER. Then set that in both this field and in the tags field of situation_streaker.

TdescFragTag.name: household_sim_tests
TdescFragTag.description: Tests to verify the Sims on the household can be valid targets for the nightime visit.

TunableEnum.name: power_buck_type
TunableEnum.description: Type of buck type for the vampire powers to be enabled for the vampire trying to enter into the visiting household.

Tunable.name: save_lock_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip/message to show when the player tries to save the game while this situation is running. Save is locked when situation starts.

TunableEnum.name: sleep_category_tag
TunableEnum.description: These tag values are used for testing interactions.

TunableList.name: vampire_discovered_buffs
TunableList.description: Buff's that will push the vampire to leave the situation since it's been discovered by the household owners or by an anti vampire object.

TunableTuple.description: Buff to make the vampire enter its discovered state.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

TunableTuple.name: arrival_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for telling a Sim to go and to the active lot from the walkby spawn point.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: bite_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for forcing the bite interaction on the chosen target Sim.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

Tunable.name: bite_interaction
Tunable.description: Bite interaction to push on the selected Sim to be run by the visiting vampire.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: break_in_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for pushing the Sim into the house depending on the active powers that it has.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: leave_startled_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for forcing the the vampire to leave.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to the SituationJob used for the Sim performing the vampire nighttime situation.
